item.title: AFFiNE Next-Gen Knowledge Base to Notion and Miro
item.description: Discover AFFiNE, the new open-source, privacy-focused, and local-first knowledge base that aims to overcome the limitations of popular tools like Miro and Notion. With AFFiNE, you can seamlessly switch between different views, including whiteboard, Kanban, and page editing modes, and access fully functional blocks anywhere. Plus, with features like data privacy, community-driven extensibility, and native cross-platform support, AFFiNE is a top contender for anyone looking to store, integrate, and manage their workflows in one unified place.
